validation_criteria.Error Message: One or more values listed on the Companies Mapping tab either does not exist, or does not exactly match a value provided on the Companies tab. Please check spelling/spacing or add/remove values as necessary.
Company Name must be unique and cannot be duplicated.
Company Name is a required column and must be populated for the used row.

One or more values listed on the Companies tab either does not exist, or does not exactly match a value provided on the Companies Mapping tab. Please check spelling/spacing or add/remove values as necessary.

SIREN number must contain 9 digits.
SIRET number for France must contain 14 digits, the 9 first being the SIREN number.

validation_criteria.PK\\Condition: Companies!Company Tax ID Type=HMRC Office Number
validation_criteria.Error Message: HMRC Office Number must contain 3 digits.

validation_criteria.PK\\Condition: Companies!Company Tax ID Type=Employer Accounts Office Reference Number
validation_criteria.Error Message: Employer Accounts Office Reference Number requires 3 digits, the letter "P", an alpha characther, 7 digits, and a final digit or the letter "X".

Best Practice: the SIRET number should only be provided on the company level if only one establishment is associated with this company. If not, please provide the SIREN number on the company level, and the SIRET number on the Establishment level.
Company Tax ID Type is a required column for United States of America rows and must be populated.
Company Tax ID Type is invalid.
If one of these columns is populated, all of these columns must be populated: Company Tax ID 2, Company Tax ID Type 2.
Company Tax ID 2 column must be unique and cannot be duplicated.

validation_criteria.PK\\Condition: Companies!Company Tax ID Type=Companies!Company Tax ID Type 2
validation_criteria.Error Message: Company Tax ID Type 2 can not be the same as Company Tax ID Type 1.

validation_criteria.PK\\Condition: Companies!Company Tax ID Type=HMRC Office Number
validation_criteria.Error Message: If the Company is located in the UK and one Tax ID Type is the HMRC Office Number, the Employer PAYE Reference is needed as well.

validation_criteria.PK\\Condition: Companies!Company Tax ID Type=Employer PAYE Reference
validation_criteria.Error Message: If the Company is located in the UK and one Tax ID Type is the Employer PAYE Reference, the HMRC Office Number is needed as well.

Best Practice: the SIRET number should only be provided on the company level if only one establishment is associated with this company. If not, please provide the SIREN number on the company level, and the SIRET number on the Establishment level.
